      • EXERTION_FLOW

        public static final String EXERTION_FLOW
        A flow type indicates if this exertion can be executed sequentially, in parallel, or concurrently with other component exertions within this exertion. The concurrent execution requires all mapped inputs in the exertion context to be assigned before this exertion can be executed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
